content.text: {"translationLines":[{"lineNumber":251092,"originalJapaneseLine":"これしか手段がないんだと・・","translatedEnglishLine":"So this is the only option...?"},{"lineNumber":251093,"originalJapaneseLine":"やはり、俺様が倒すしかないな。","translatedEnglishLine":"As expected, I myself have no choice but to defeat it."},{"lineNumber":251094,"originalJapaneseLine":"で、魔人ガルティアはどこにいるんだ？","translatedEnglishLine":"So, where is the demon lord Galtia?"},{"lineNumber":251095,"originalJapaneseLine":"私は知らない、ここからもう少し南にいった所のＸＸＸ草原に","translatedEnglishLine":"I don't know, but a little further south from here, in the XXX grasslands..."},{"lineNumber":251096,"originalJapaneseLine":"我が軍の主力である炎、氷軍が展開している。","translatedEnglishLine":"Our main forces, the Flame and Ice armies, are deployed there."},{"lineNumber":251097,"originalJapaneseLine":"そちらにいけば分かると・・","translatedEnglishLine":"If you go there, you'll find out..."},{"lineNumber":251098,"originalJapaneseLine":"[２３０／１／恐怖の放送]の選択後","translatedEnglishLine":"[After choosing 230/1/Frightening Broadcast]"},{"lineNumber":251099,"originalJapaneseLine":"よし、ではメディウサ方面に向かうぞ。","translatedEnglishLine":"Alright, then let's head toward Medusa's direction."},{"lineNumber":251100,"originalJapaneseLine":"地図を表示","translatedEnglishLine":"Display the map."},{"lineNumber":251101,"originalJapaneseLine":"ランス達は西部方面に向かった","translatedEnglishLine":"Rance and the others headed westward."},{"lineNumber":251102,"originalJapaneseLine":"・・・て、豪雨かよーー（背景　ゼス平原／豪雨）","translatedEnglishLine":"...What, a heavy rain?! (Background: Zess Plains / Heavy Rain)"},{"lineNumber":251103,"originalJapaneseLine":"雨の中を進むランス達・・・","translatedEnglishLine":"Rance and the others advance through the rain..."},{"lineNumber":251104,"originalJapaneseLine":"傘を差しながらの移動は面倒だから嫌いだ。","translatedEnglishLine":"I hate moving around while holding an umbrella because it's troublesome."},{"lineNumber":251105,"originalJapaneseLine":"　ネタ．ランスの世界にも雨はある、で、律儀に傘を差したりしている","translatedEnglishLine":"Joke: There is rain in Rance's world too, and he dutifully uses an umbrella."},{"lineNumber":251106,"originalJapaneseLine":"うーん、なんか帰りたくなってきたぞ。","translatedEnglishLine":"Hmm, I somehow feel like going back."},{"lineNumber":251107,"originalJapaneseLine":"雨が降った普通休みだしな、帰るか","translatedEnglishLine":"It's normal to rest when it rains, so shall we go back?"},{"lineNumber":251108,"originalJapaneseLine":"駄目ですと誰か","translatedEnglishLine":"No way, someone says."},{"lineNumber":251109,"originalJapaneseLine":"ランス達のすぐ近く、魔物中隊が動いていた。","translatedEnglishLine":"Close to Rance and the others, a monster squad was moving."},{"lineNumber":251110,"originalJapaneseLine":"魔物隊長と部下の会話","translatedEnglishLine":"Conversation between the monster captain and his subordinates."},{"lineNumber":251111,"originalJapaneseLine":"隊長やる気まんまんですね、俺達は後方待機だったのに","translatedEnglishLine":"Captain, you're really fired up, even though we were supposed to stay in the rear."},{"lineNumber":251112,"originalJapaneseLine":"わざわざ前線に出るのを志願するなんて","translatedEnglishLine":"Volunteering to go to the front lines deliberately..."},{"lineNumber":251113,"originalJapaneseLine":"（内心、余計な事しゃがってと思っている、魔物達も戦うのが嫌な奴もいる）","translatedEnglishLine":"(Internally thinking 'He's doing unnecessary things,' some monsters also dislike fighting.)"},{"lineNumber":251114,"originalJapaneseLine":"そう不満に思うな。俺も危険な目にあうのはごめんだ","translatedEnglishLine":"Don't be so dissatisfied. I don't want to get into danger either."},{"lineNumber":251115,"originalJapaneseLine":"西南方面、オールドゼスと呼ばれる都市を包囲している部隊に参加する訳だが","translatedEnglishLine":"We're joining the unit besieging the city called Old Zess in the southwestern area."},{"lineNumber":251116,"originalJapaneseLine":"最前線ですよね、そこ","translatedEnglishLine":"That's the front line, right?"},{"lineNumber":251117,"originalJapaneseLine":"ああ、だが、戦闘は無い。","translatedEnglishLine":"Yes, but there's no combat."},{"lineNumber":251118,"originalJapaneseLine":"魔人ガルティア様が人間共にこう脅迫しているのよ、命か食が選べとな","translatedEnglishLine":"Demon lord Galtia is threatening the humans like this: choose life or food."},{"lineNumber":251119,"originalJapaneseLine":"攻められたくなければ食料を差し出せという訳だ、人間共はガルティア様の","translatedEnglishLine":"If they don't want to be attacked, they have to hand over their food. The humans..."},{"lineNumber":251120,"originalJapaneseLine":"恐ろしさを知って今は素直に従っているらしい","translatedEnglishLine":"Knowing Galtia's fearsome nature, they are obedient now."},{"lineNumber":251121,"originalJapaneseLine":"そう、オールドゼス方面の最前線は戦争状態とはなばかりで、人間共を包囲していたら","translatedEnglishLine":"Yes, the front line at Old Zess looks like a war, surrounding the humans..."},{"lineNumber":251122,"originalJapaneseLine":"人間共のおいしい食べ物を食い放題なのだ","translatedEnglishLine":"And they get to eat the humans' delicious food as much as they want."},{"lineNumber":251123,"originalJapaneseLine":"　","translatedEnglishLine":""},{"lineNumber":251124,"originalJapaneseLine":"少し離れた場所、ランス達は魔軍を発見した。","translatedEnglishLine":"A little further away, Rance and the others spotted the demon army."},{"lineNumber":251125,"originalJapaneseLine":"こんな所にいるとは思わなかった、最前線とは離れた場所なのにと","translatedEnglishLine":"I didn't think they'd be here, so far from the front lines."},{"lineNumber":251126,"originalJapaneseLine":"数は２００ほどですね。","translatedEnglishLine":"There are about 200 of them."},{"lineNumber":251127,"originalJapaneseLine":"ついでだし、やってしまうか","translatedEnglishLine":"While we're at it, should we take them out?"},{"lineNumber":251128,"originalJapaneseLine":"＞戦闘","translatedEnglishLine":"> Battle"},{"lineNumber":251129,"originalJapaneseLine":"＞戦闘　ランス達は勝利します。","translatedEnglishLine":"> Battle - Rance and the others win."},{"lineNumber":251130,"originalJapaneseLine":"倒した魔物兵から情報を得ます。","translatedEnglishLine":"We obtain information from the defeated monster soldiers."},{"lineNumber":251131,"originalJapaneseLine":"南部の大都市オールドゼス、魔軍に包囲されている。","translatedEnglishLine":"The large southern city of Old Zess is surrounded by demon troops."},{"lineNumber":251132,"originalJapaneseLine":"食料が奪われて餓死者も出ているとか","translatedEnglishLine":"Food has been taken away and some people have died of starvation."},{"lineNumber":251133,"originalJapaneseLine":"こいつら、そこに向かうつもりだったらしい。","translatedEnglishLine":"Apparently, they were planning to head there."},{"lineNumber":251134,"originalJapaneseLine":"それを聞いてシィルが何か心配する","translatedEnglishLine":"Upon hearing this, Shiruru becomes worried about something."},{"lineNumber":251135,"originalJapaneseLine":"聞き出すと両親がその近くの村に住んでいると","translatedEnglishLine":"When asked, she says her parents live in a nearby village."},{"lineNumber":251136,"originalJapaneseLine":"いえ、いいんです、もう何年も会ってないし・・今更あえないし・・","translatedEnglishLine":"No, it's fine. I haven't seen them for years... It's too late now..."},{"lineNumber":251137,"originalJapaneseLine":"大丈夫と思います・・といいつつ、気になってしかたないのない様子","translatedEnglishLine":"She says she's okay... but can't help but be concerned."},{"lineNumber":251138,"originalJapaneseLine":"よし、方向転換だ、オールドゼスに言ってみよう。","translatedEnglishLine":"Alright, let's change course and head to Old Zess."},{"lineNumber":251139,"originalJapaneseLine":"誰かが言う、そんな私的な理由で作戦を変更するのは・・","translatedEnglishLine":"Someone says, 'Changing the operation for such personal reasons is...'"},{"lineNumber":251140,"originalJapaneseLine":"はっ、勘違いするな、オールドゼスが酷い状況と聞いて","translatedEnglishLine":"Hah, don't misunderstand. I heard Old Zess is in a terrible state."},{"lineNumber":251141,"originalJapaneseLine":"魔人メディウサより魔人ガルディアを先に退治せねばいけないと","translatedEnglishLine":"I have to defeat Demon Lord Galtia before Demon Lord Medusa."},{"lineNumber":251142,"originalJapaneseLine":"俺は状況判断したのだ、いいから俺についてこい","translatedEnglishLine":"I assessed the situation, so just follow me."},{"lineNumber":251143,"originalJapaneseLine":"・・・そ、そうなんですかランス様と　ランスとシィルふたりになったら聞くシィル","translatedEnglishLine":"...I-Is that so, Lord Rance? When it's just Rance and Shiruru, Shiruru asks."},{"lineNumber":251144,"originalJapaneseLine":"がははは、てめぇの親か一度面を見てみたかったのだ。","translatedEnglishLine":"Gahaha, I've always wanted to see your parents' faces once."},{"lineNumber":251145,"originalJapaneseLine":"えっ、いいんです、いいんです・・というシィルを無視","translatedEnglishLine":"Ignoring Shiruru saying, 'Ah, it's fine, really...'"},{"lineNumber":251146,"originalJapaneseLine":"心配なんだろ、遠慮するな、くっくっ・・","translatedEnglishLine":"You're worried, right? Don't hold back. Heh heh..."},{"lineNumber":251147,"originalJapaneseLine":"その笑い、怖いです","translatedEnglishLine":"That laugh is scary."},{"lineNumber":251148,"originalJapaneseLine":"さっきまでの雨とはうってかわって、日照・・","translatedEnglishLine":"Contrasting the rain from earlier, now there's bright sunshine..."},{"lineNumber":251149,"originalJapaneseLine":"うわっ・・今度はカンカン照りかよ・・","translatedEnglishLine":"Whoa... Now it's blazing hot..."},{"lineNumber":251150,"originalJapaneseLine":"うざっ・・・","translatedEnglishLine":"Annoying..."},{"lineNumber":251151,"originalJapaneseLine":"シィルの過去話１","translatedEnglishLine":"Shiruru's Past Story 1"}]}

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: これしか手段がないんだと・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: So this is the only option...?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: やはり、俺様が倒すしかないな。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: As expected, I myself have no choice but to defeat it.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: で、魔人ガルティアはどこにいるんだ？
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: So, where is the demon lord Galtia?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 私は知らない、ここからもう少し南にいった所のＸＸＸ草原に
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I don't know, but a little further south from here, in the XXX grasslands...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 我が軍の主力である炎、氷軍が展開している。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Our main forces, the Flame and Ice armies, are deployed there.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そちらにいけば分かると・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: If you go there, you'll find out...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: [２３０／１／恐怖の放送]の選択後
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: [After choosing 230/1/Frightening Broadcast]

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: よし、ではメディウサ方面に向かうぞ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Alright, then let's head toward Medusa's direction.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 地図を表示
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Display the map.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランス達は西部方面に向かった
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Rance and the others headed westward.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ・・・て、豪雨かよーー（背景　ゼス平原／豪雨）
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: ...What, a heavy rain?! (Background: Zess Plains / Heavy Rain)

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 雨の中を進むランス達・・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Rance and the others advance through the rain...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 傘を差しながらの移動は面倒だから嫌いだ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I hate moving around while holding an umbrella because it's troublesome.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ネタ．ランスの世界にも雨はある、で、律儀に傘を差したりしている
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Joke: There is rain in Rance's world too, and he dutifully uses an umbrella.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: うーん、なんか帰りたくなってきたぞ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Hmm, I somehow feel like going back.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 雨が降った普通休みだしな、帰るか
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It's normal to rest when it rains, so shall we go back?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 駄目ですと誰か
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: No way, someone says.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランス達のすぐ近く、魔物中隊が動いていた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Close to Rance and the others, a monster squad was moving.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔物隊長と部下の会話
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Conversation between the monster captain and his subordinates.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 隊長やる気まんまんですね、俺達は後方待機だったのに
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Captain, you're really fired up, even though we were supposed to stay in the rear.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: わざわざ前線に出るのを志願するなんて
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Volunteering to go to the front lines deliberately...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: （内心、余計な事しゃがってと思っている、魔物達も戦うのが嫌な奴もいる）
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: (Internally thinking 'He's doing unnecessary things,' some monsters also dislike fighting.)

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そう不満に思うな。俺も危険な目にあうのはごめんだ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Don't be so dissatisfied. I don't want to get into danger either.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 西南方面、オールドゼスと呼ばれる都市を包囲している部隊に参加する訳だが
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: We're joining the unit besieging the city called Old Zess in the southwestern area.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 最前線ですよね、そこ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: That's the front line, right?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ああ、だが、戦闘は無い。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Yes, but there's no combat.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔人ガルティア様が人間共にこう脅迫しているのよ、命か食が選べとな
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Demon lord Galtia is threatening the humans like this: choose life or food.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 攻められたくなければ食料を差し出せという訳だ、人間共はガルティア様の
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: If they don't want to be attacked, they have to hand over their food. The humans...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 恐ろしさを知って今は素直に従っているらしい
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Knowing Galtia's fearsome nature, they are obedient now.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そう、オールドゼス方面の最前線は戦争状態とはなばかりで、人間共を包囲していたら
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Yes, the front line at Old Zess looks like a war, surrounding the humans...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 人間共のおいしい食べ物を食い放題なのだ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: And they get to eat the humans' delicious food as much as they want.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 少し離れた場所、ランス達は魔軍を発見した。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: A little further away, Rance and the others spotted the demon army.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: こんな所にいるとは思わなかった、最前線とは離れた場所なのにと
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I didn't think they'd be here, so far from the front lines.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 数は２００ほどですね。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: There are about 200 of them.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ついでだし、やってしまうか
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: While we're at it, should we take them out?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ＞戦闘
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: > Battle

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ＞戦闘　ランス達は勝利します。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: > Battle - Rance and the others win.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 倒した魔物兵から情報を得ます。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: We obtain information from the defeated monster soldiers.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 南部の大都市オールドゼス、魔軍に包囲されている。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The large southern city of Old Zess is surrounded by demon troops.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 食料が奪われて餓死者も出ているとか
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Food has been taken away and some people have died of starvation.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: こいつら、そこに向かうつもりだったらしい。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Apparently, they were planning to head there.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: それを聞いてシィルが何か心配する
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Upon hearing this, Shiruru becomes worried about something.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 聞き出すと両親がその近くの村に住んでいると
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: When asked, she says her parents live in a nearby village.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: いえ、いいんです、もう何年も会ってないし・・今更あえないし・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: No, it's fine. I haven't seen them for years... It's too late now...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 大丈夫と思います・・といいつつ、気になってしかたないのない様子
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: She says she's okay... but can't help but be concerned.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: よし、方向転換だ、オールドゼスに言ってみよう。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Alright, let's change course and head to Old Zess.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 誰かが言う、そんな私的な理由で作戦を変更するのは・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Someone says, 'Changing the operation for such personal reasons is...'

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: はっ、勘違いするな、オールドゼスが酷い状況と聞いて
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Hah, don't misunderstand. I heard Old Zess is in a terrible state.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔人メディウサより魔人ガルディアを先に退治せねばいけないと
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I have to defeat Demon Lord Galtia before Demon Lord Medusa.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 俺は状況判断したのだ、いいから俺についてこい
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I assessed the situation, so just follow me.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ・・・そ、そうなんですかランス様と　ランスとシィルふたりになったら聞くシィル
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: ...I-Is that so, Lord Rance? When it's just Rance and Shiruru, Shiruru asks.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: がははは、てめぇの親か一度面を見てみたかったのだ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Gahaha, I've always wanted to see your parents' faces once.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: えっ、いいんです、いいんです・・というシィルを無視
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Ignoring Shiruru saying, 'Ah, it's fine, really...'

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 心配なんだろ、遠慮するな、くっくっ・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: You're worried, right? Don't hold back. Heh heh...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: その笑い、怖いです
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: That laugh is scary.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: さっきまでの雨とはうってかわって、日照・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Contrasting the rain from earlier, now there's bright sunshine...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: うわっ・・今度はカンカン照りかよ・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Whoa... Now it's blazing hot...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: うざっ・・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Annoying...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: シィルの過去話１
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Shiruru's Past Story 1

translationLines.description: Array of objects, each representing a line from the input

originalJapaneseLine.description: The original line in Japanese exactly as it was in the input

translatedEnglishLine.description: The original line translated to English

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: これしか手段がないんだと・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: So this is the only option...?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: やはり、俺様が倒すしかないな。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: As expected, I myself have no choice but to defeat it.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: で、魔人ガルティアはどこにいるんだ？
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: So, where is the demon lord Galtia?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 私は知らない、ここからもう少し南にいった所のＸＸＸ草原に
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I don't know, but a little further south from here, in the XXX grasslands...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 我が軍の主力である炎、氷軍が展開している。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Our main forces, the Flame and Ice armies, are deployed there.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そちらにいけば分かると・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: If you go there, you'll find out...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: [２３０／１／恐怖の放送]の選択後
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: [After choosing 230/1/Frightening Broadcast]

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: よし、ではメディウサ方面に向かうぞ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Alright, then let's head toward Medusa's direction.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 地図を表示
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Display the map.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランス達は西部方面に向かった
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Rance and the others headed westward.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ・・・て、豪雨かよーー（背景　ゼス平原／豪雨）
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: ...What, a heavy rain?! (Background: Zess Plains / Heavy Rain)

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 雨の中を進むランス達・・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Rance and the others advance through the rain...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 傘を差しながらの移動は面倒だから嫌いだ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I hate moving around while holding an umbrella because it's troublesome.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ネタ．ランスの世界にも雨はある、で、律儀に傘を差したりしている
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Joke: There is rain in Rance's world too, and he dutifully uses an umbrella.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: うーん、なんか帰りたくなってきたぞ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Hmm, I somehow feel like going back.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 雨が降った普通休みだしな、帰るか
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It's normal to rest when it rains, so shall we go back?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 駄目ですと誰か
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: No way, someone says.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランス達のすぐ近く、魔物中隊が動いていた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Close to Rance and the others, a monster squad was moving.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔物隊長と部下の会話
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Conversation between the monster captain and his subordinates.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 隊長やる気まんまんですね、俺達は後方待機だったのに
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Captain, you're really fired up, even though we were supposed to stay in the rear.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: わざわざ前線に出るのを志願するなんて
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Volunteering to go to the front lines deliberately...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: （内心、余計な事しゃがってと思っている、魔物達も戦うのが嫌な奴もいる）
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: (Internally thinking 'He's doing unnecessary things,' some monsters also dislike fighting.)

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そう不満に思うな。俺も危険な目にあうのはごめんだ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Don't be so dissatisfied. I don't want to get into danger either.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 西南方面、オールドゼスと呼ばれる都市を包囲している部隊に参加する訳だが
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: We're joining the unit besieging the city called Old Zess in the southwestern area.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 最前線ですよね、そこ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: That's the front line, right?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ああ、だが、戦闘は無い。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Yes, but there's no combat.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔人ガルティア様が人間共にこう脅迫しているのよ、命か食が選べとな
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Demon lord Galtia is threatening the humans like this: choose life or food.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 攻められたくなければ食料を差し出せという訳だ、人間共はガルティア様の
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: If they don't want to be attacked, they have to hand over their food. The humans...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 恐ろしさを知って今は素直に従っているらしい
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Knowing Galtia's fearsome nature, they are obedient now.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そう、オールドゼス方面の最前線は戦争状態とはなばかりで、人間共を包囲していたら
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Yes, the front line at Old Zess looks like a war, surrounding the humans...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 人間共のおいしい食べ物を食い放題なのだ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: And they get to eat the humans' delicious food as much as they want.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 少し離れた場所、ランス達は魔軍を発見した。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: A little further away, Rance and the others spotted the demon army.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: こんな所にいるとは思わなかった、最前線とは離れた場所なのにと
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I didn't think they'd be here, so far from the front lines.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 数は２００ほどですね。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: There are about 200 of them.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ついでだし、やってしまうか
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: While we're at it, should we take them out?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ＞戦闘
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: > Battle

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ＞戦闘　ランス達は勝利します。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: > Battle - Rance and the others win.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 倒した魔物兵から情報を得ます。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: We obtain information from the defeated monster soldiers.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 南部の大都市オールドゼス、魔軍に包囲されている。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The large southern city of Old Zess is surrounded by demon troops.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 食料が奪われて餓死者も出ているとか
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Food has been taken away and some people have died of starvation.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: こいつら、そこに向かうつもりだったらしい。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Apparently, they were planning to head there.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: それを聞いてシィルが何か心配する
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Upon hearing this, Shiruru becomes worried about something.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 聞き出すと両親がその近くの村に住んでいると
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: When asked, she says her parents live in a nearby village.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: いえ、いいんです、もう何年も会ってないし・・今更あえないし・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: No, it's fine. I haven't seen them for years... It's too late now...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 大丈夫と思います・・といいつつ、気になってしかたないのない様子
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: She says she's okay... but can't help but be concerned.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: よし、方向転換だ、オールドゼスに言ってみよう。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Alright, let's change course and head to Old Zess.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 誰かが言う、そんな私的な理由で作戦を変更するのは・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Someone says, 'Changing the operation for such personal reasons is...'

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: はっ、勘違いするな、オールドゼスが酷い状況と聞いて
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Hah, don't misunderstand. I heard Old Zess is in a terrible state.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔人メディウサより魔人ガルディアを先に退治せねばいけないと
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I have to defeat Demon Lord Galtia before Demon Lord Medusa.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 俺は状況判断したのだ、いいから俺についてこい
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I assessed the situation, so just follow me.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ・・・そ、そうなんですかランス様と　ランスとシィルふたりになったら聞くシィル
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: ...I-Is that so, Lord Rance? When it's just Rance and Shiruru, Shiruru asks.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: がははは、てめぇの親か一度面を見てみたかったのだ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Gahaha, I've always wanted to see your parents' faces once.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: えっ、いいんです、いいんです・・というシィルを無視
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Ignoring Shiruru saying, 'Ah, it's fine, really...'

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 心配なんだろ、遠慮するな、くっくっ・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: You're worried, right? Don't hold back. Heh heh...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: その笑い、怖いです
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: That laugh is scary.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: さっきまでの雨とはうってかわって、日照・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Contrasting the rain from earlier, now there's bright sunshine...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: うわっ・・今度はカンカン照りかよ・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Whoa... Now it's blazing hot...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: うざっ・・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Annoying...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: シィルの過去話１
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Shiruru's Past Story 1
